meanings.definition: The state of being aware of and able to think and perceive one's surroundings.
meanings.sent1: Our consciousnesses help us understand the world around us.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied different consciousnesses to learn more about perception.
meanings.sent3: The consciousnesses of the curious cat led it to explore every corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: In a crowded city, the consciousnesses of the people merged into a chaotic symphony of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the essence of human consciousnesses in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The fact of awareness by the mind of itself and the world.
meanings.sent1: Her consciousnesses reflected on her own thoughts and the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent2: Philosophers often ponder the complexities of consciousnesses and self-awareness.
meanings.sent3: The consciousnesses of the mirror surprised the young child as she saw her reflection for the first time.
meanings.sent4: As the sun rose, the consciousnesses of the world awakened to a new day.
meanings.sent5: The writer's novel delved deep into the characters' consciousnesses, revealing their innermost thoughts.
